citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility does not currently have a written plan to address environment enhancement for the bird species maintained.
The plan must address the social grouping needs, environmental enrichment needs and any special considerations to
ensure the psychological well-being of the birds. The facility must develop, document, and follow a species-appropriate
plan for the environment enhancement of birds that is in accordance with currently accepted professional standards and is
approved by the attending veterinarian.
Correct by: Nov. 21, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n
